A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful movie\, beautiful scenery\, not half bad acting and it was nice to see a solid mix of puppet\, animatronics\, and cgi... but the writing\, execution\, and pacing was so atrocious that the bad outweighs the good. Rian is a good director\, but please don't let him write anything else in the saga\, his story telling sucks.
